import Error from './Error' import Notification from './Notification' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' function PersonForm({ handleForm, newName, handleNameChange, newNumber, handleNumberChange, success, error, }) { return (
) } PersonForm.propTypes = { handleForm: PropTypes.func, newNam: PropTypes.string, handleNameChange: PropTypes.func, newNumber: PropTypes.string, handleNumberChange: PropTypes.func, success: PropTypes.string, error: PropTypes.string, } export default PersonForm
